trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Ottawa
There were no other sightings in Ottawa on or around January 10th 1986
divs: Sighting DetailsThis object was sighted by myself and my neighbor as we were outside on a cold January night playing with my telescope. I was living near the airport in Ottawa at the time. We were playing with the telescope stand when a large cigar shaped object suddenly lit up above us (green in colour). It moved through the sky at a slow speed and then suddenly faded gradually out of sight. It then lit up again gradually after several miles and continued moving along. It continued in this pattern until it went beyond our sight. We called the air traffic control people at the airport to see if they had seen it but to no avail.
Summary: A cigar shaped object fading in and out (lighting)
